snippet: Mr. Scherer, the founder of the magazine Proceso, created a school of critical journalism that unmasked political corruption in Mexico and helped lay the groundwork for its democratic transition.
abstract: Julio Scherer Garcia, a newspaper and magazine editor who created a school of critical journalism that exposed political corruption in Mexico, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Scherer, the founder of the magazine Proceso, created a school of critical journalism that unmasked political corruption in Mexico and helped lay the groundwork for its democratic transition.

headline.main: Julio Scherer García, Investigative Journalist in Mexico, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Julio Scherer García, 88, Watchdog Journalist, Dies
